text: Salvatore Biasco (31 December 1939 â€“ 6 September 2022) was an Italian economist and politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party of the Left. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1996 to 2001. Biasco died on 6 September 2022 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian economists Category:Politicians from Rome
